descriptionHtml:
Every week I will choose a handful of popular mods, or just ones that I find particularly interesting to showcase in my video series.  

I demonstrate how each mod works, i\'ll give my own opinion on how I like the mod, so that you can form your own opinion, on whether or not you think its worth downloading.

For each mod, I show you the differences between the vanilla version and the modded version, highlighting the work of the modder and of course giving him or her the credit.

Latest Episode
[youtube]k0V5uDmyr5A[/youtube] 

[COLOR=\"Magenta\"]Episodes[/Color]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6EN8oeXFZWs&feature=relmfu]Skyrim Mods Weekly #1 - Featuring Enhanced Blood Textures, Nude Females, Enhanced Night Sky, No Spiders, Obligatory Chainmail Bikini[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3mzHPQkBOPk&feature=channel_video_title]Skyrim Mods Weekly #2 - Featuring FXAA Post Process Injector, Lockpick Pro, Skyrim Sunglare, HQ Texture Pack Whiterun WIP, Snow Leopard Forsworn Armor, Map in full 3D[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vsKkQdIf9U&feature=channel_video_title]Skyrim Mods Weekly #3 - Featuring Realistic Water Textures, Skyrim HD - 2K Textures, Realistic Smoke and Ember, Landscape Texture Pack WIP, Killable Children, Fun With Voice Mods[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N4kUoUtBdSU&feature=channel_video_title]Skyrim Mods Weekly #4 - Featuring Skyrim Enhanced Shaders, QD Inventory, Nightingale Prime, Eisen Platte Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3HD3J25qSs&feature=channel_video_title]Skyrim Mods Weekly #5 - Featuring Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition, Nocturnal Dress, Deadly Spell Impacts, Dance Animation, Link from Legend of Zelda, The Legend of Zelda[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j3h5DSNfDJI&list=PL8A57A7E731147825&index=2&]Skyrim Mods Weekly #6 - Featuring SkyUI, Midas Magic, Coverwomen, XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement, Better Females, Tytanis[/url]
[url=www.youtube.com/watch?v=zc0kF0mM3ko&feature=relmfu]Skyrim Mods Weekly #7 - Featuring A Quality World Map, Categorized Favorites Menu, Coolsims Hair Pack, AOF Believable Hair, Straight hair retexture, Triss Dark Brotherhood Armor, Dr Zoidberg Mudcrab, Magicka Sabers[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NzSLjXVwOoc]Skyrim Mods Weekly #8 - Featuring Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set, 41 HQ Nocturnal Robes, Confident ENB, Catwalk, Better males, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Macho Dragons[/url]


[COLOR=\"Magenta\"]If you are new to modding, and you need help installing the mods, then check out this video:[/Color]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sLOCk4YqKoM&feature=relmfu]How to Install/Download Skyrim Mods[/url]

[COLOR=\"Magenta\"]Extras:[/Color]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KvngfbiRh6o&feature=relmfu]Top 5 Mods at Launch[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0m_YmtvHyxE&feature=relmfu]Top 5 Essential Mods[/url]
author: MMOxReview
